Oh, Deb! You should have seen and heard her sing and play her guitar!

A real treat!

messages.subject: Earth Mother Marji, was Considering Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ***You seem like an earth motherly type, radiating calm and peace :-)*** I get that calm and peaceful feeling from just her e-mails.   She must be amazing in
messages.messageBody:
***You seem like an earth
motherly type, radiating calm and peace :-)***

I get that calm and peaceful feeling from just her e-mails. She must be
amazing in person!

Deb L, fan of those calm and peaceful types.<g>
